ch0252_00_kabu_salon/8201_2002_01_10:
You’re on fire today, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Keep up the good work!
ch0252_00_kabu_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s work together
to make today the best it can be!
ch0252_00_kabu_salon/8201_2101_01_10: I found this on a run. Would you like to have it?
ch0252_00_kabu_salon/8201_2101_02_10:
You’re the type of person who can find a good
use for any item!
ch0252_00_kabu_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
I’ll give you a present and a cheer to help fuel
your flames, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0252_00_kabu_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
Hustle, hustle, hustle, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You can do it, you can do it,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0252_00_kabu_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
This is a present for you, from the bottom of
my heart! Please take it!
ch0252_00_kabu_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
When I’m with you, [Name:PlayerNickname ],
my spirit burns even hotter!
ch0252_00_kabu_salon/8201_2103_03_10:
I will expend my strength as much as I am able to
at your side—while learning from your example!
ch0252_00_kabu_salon/8201_2201_01_10: What should we chat about today?
ch0252_00_kabu_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Tell me what’s on
your mind!
ch0252_00_kabu_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
When I talk to you, [Name:PlayerNickname ], it
sparks a fire in my heart! What burning topics
shall we discuss today?
ch0252_00_kabu_salon/8201_2302_01_10: Thanks! I’ll be sure to use this well!
ch0252_00_kabu_salon/8201_2301_01_10:
Is that for me? Thank you so much,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0252_00_kabu_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
I’ll be sure to get you something in
return—something that’ll get you fired up!
ch0252_00_kabu_salon/8201_2402_01_10:
That was an interesting chat! Let’s do this again
sometime!
ch0252_00_kabu_salon/8201_2401_01_10:
Thanks for chatting with me! You’re always a
pleasure to talk to.
ch0252_00_kabu_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
I’m so lucky to have a friend like you that I can
have nice, long talks with.
ch0252_00_kabu_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
This is a relaxing spot. I suppose it’d be difficult
to do any intense training that involves shouting
here...
ch0252_00_kabu_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
Maybe it’d be OK if I limited myself to just playing
tag with the Pokémon out in the yard?
ch0252_00_kabu_salon/8002_0701_01_10: There’s no shame in failing or falling into a slump.
ch0252_00_kabu_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
It’s those continuous setbacks that help shape you
into who you’re meant to be.
ch0252_00_kabu_salon/8002_0701_03_10: One day I think you’ll look back and realize that!
ch0252_00_kabu_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
If you want to keep your fire burning and
improve, one way to motivate yourself is
through self-reflection.
ch0252_00_kabu_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
But interacting with Pokémon and other people is
an even more effective way to aim higher!
ch0252_00_kabu_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
I think the interactions we have here will make our
hearts even stronger!
ch0252_00_kabu_salon/8003_0701_04_10:
Be sure to treasure all of this precious time we’re
able to spend with everyone!
